reviewText: We could not turn it off!  Excellent!
Love it...great addition to my Tom Petty collection ;)

This is total crap!!! I'd give it 0 stars if I could. Looks like someone threw this together in windows movie maker. Terrible quality, just a bunch of rip off footage from other DVDs and tv. I can't believe I wasted my money on this!!! Buyer beware!!! Do not spend your money on this!!!
Enjoyed this DVD with all various stages of the bands long and successful career.  Also enjoyed the interviews with Tom.
